properties.name: jeap.governance.deploymentlog.enabled
properties.description: Flag to enable/disable the import of from the deployment log.

properties.name: jeap.governance.deploymentlog.url
properties.description: URL of the deployment log to import data from.

properties.name: jeap.governance.deploymentlog.username
properties.description: Username for basic authentication when connecting to the deployment log.

properties.name: jeap.governance.deploymentlog.password
properties.description: Password for basic authentication when connecting to the deployment log.
